name: Advance Wars Returns
overview: Advance Wars Returns is a romhack of AW2 and it contains a brand new story with 42 new campaign missions in both a normal and a hard difficulty, a completely new War Room with 30 missions, an AWBW section in Vs. Mode for your PvP desires and reworked CO-Power mechanics and COs. The Patch can be applied using LunarIPS.
